verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w In|strong="H1732"\w* You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, I \w have|strong="H1732"\w* taken refuge; let me never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* put \w to|strong="H1732"\w* shame; save me \w by|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness.

Incline \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w*; come quickly \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescue|strong="H6403"\w*. \w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H2620"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* stronghold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w You|strong="H3467"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w*; lead \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* guide \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sake \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Your|strong="H5186"\w* name.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* free \w me|strong="H5148"\w* \w from|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* laid out \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5148"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* refuge.

\w Into|strong="H3318"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w I|strong="H3588"\w* commit \w my|strong="H3318"\w* spirit; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* redeemed \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, God \w of|strong="H3318"\w* truth.

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* hate those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* cling \w to|strong="H3068"\w* worthless idols, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* trust.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w my|strong="H8104"\w* affliction; \w You|strong="H8104"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* known \w the|strong="H8104"\w* anguish \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* soul.

\w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* enemy; \w You|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* set \w my|strong="H7200"\w* feet \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* open.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5975"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w distress|strong="H3027"\w*; \w my|strong="H3027"\w* eyes \w fail|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* sorrow, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* soul \w and|strong="H3027"\w* body \w as|strong="H7272"\w* well.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w consumed|strong="H6244"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w grief|strong="H3708"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* years \w with|strong="H3068"\w* groaning; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w has|strong="H3068"\w* drained \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H5869"\w* wasting \w away|strong="H6244"\w*.

Among \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* enemies \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* disgrace, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* among \w my|strong="H3615"\w* neighbors \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am dreaded \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* friends—\w they|strong="H3588"\w* flee \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* see \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* street.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dead \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w mind|strong="H3045"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken vessel.

\w For|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H3820"\w* hear \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slander \w of|strong="H3627"\w* many; \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* terror \w on|strong="H1961"\w* every side. \w They|strong="H7911"\w* conspire against \w me|strong="H7911"\w* \w and|strong="H4191"\w* plot \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* say, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* God.”

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* times \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hands; deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* face shine \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* servant; \w save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* loving devotion.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* ashamed, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* called \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w be|strong="H5650"\w* put \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shame; let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* lie silent \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Sheol.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* lying lips \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w silenced|strong="H1826"\w*—lips \w that|strong="H3588"\w* speak \w with|strong="H3068"\w* arrogance \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous, full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* pride \w and|strong="H3068"\w* contempt.

How great \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* goodness which \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H8193"\w* laid \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* fear \w You|strong="H5921"\w*, which \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H8193"\w* bestowed \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6662"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*!

\w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* \w secret|strong="H6845"\w* \w place|strong="H6845"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H4100"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* schemes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*. \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w conceal|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w Your|strong="H4100"\w* \w shelter|strong="H2620"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* accusing tongues.

Blessed \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w He|strong="H6440"\w* \w has|strong="H7379"\w* shown \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* loving devotion \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* city \w under|strong="H6440"\w* \w siege|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* alarm \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H2617"\w* off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* sight!” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* plea \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* called \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* help.

Love \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, all \w His|strong="H8085"\w* saints. \w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* preserves \w the|strong="H8085"\w* faithful, \w but|strong="H8085"\w* fully repays \w the|strong="H8085"\w* arrogant.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* strong \w and|strong="H3068"\w* courageous, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
